summary: Exactly one week after the costume day fiasco, Cyrus comes downstairs to find a tray of blueberry macademia muffins on the...
body:
Exactly one week after the costume day fiasco, Cyrus comes downstairs to find a tray of blueberry macademia muffins on the kitchen table. Sharon, his stepmom, gushes about a new bakery that sells exactly the same muffins Cyrus had been asking for so many weeks ago.

Cyrus starts crying. Again.

summary: I’ve reached peak boredom, so I made a sideblog for Andi’s texts! There are lots of great blogs out there that post the texts...
body:
I’ve reached peak boredom, so I made a sideblog for Andi’s texts! There are lots of great blogs out there that post the texts for those who don’t have access to the DisneyNow app, but I haven’t found one that archives the texts from the very beginning (let me know if there is one, that would mean a lot less effort for me lmao) – so, now @andis-texts-archive can be that blog!

Right now I’m tagging each post with a few things to make them easy to find:

  • Character: both first name (ie “buffy”) and first and last (“buffy driscoll”)
  • Episode: For example, the first group of texts seem to come after 1x02 and before 1x03, so I’ve tagged them “1x02″
  • Date: This will get easier the more I update, but since the older ones just give me a vague “last year” those are all going to be tagged with the date that episode came out. When I’m more caught up, I’ll start tagging them with the date it shows in the texts.

I’ll be doing my best to post everything in order, but I’m bound to mess up on these, especially when I’m posting the older ones – so please let me know if you think I’ve tagged something with the wrong date/episode!! Or if you would prefer I tag posts differently, I’m just starting off with what makes the most sense to me.

I’m hoping you’ll be patient with me, since it might take awhile for me to get up to date, but assuming we don’t get any new episodes (or texts) until closer to summer, I’m hoping to be caught up by the time we get any new content 🤞

summary: (aren't there both daytime and primetime emmys? i think these are just the daytime emmys as the primetime emmys aren't for...
question: (aren't there both daytime and primetime emmys? i think these are just the daytime emmys as the primetime emmys aren't for months)
answer:
yes - but andi mack and most disney channel shows are eligible for both. the primetimes aren’t looking much better for us tbh. disney’s only nomination last year was for star wars on disney XD. and they haven’t actually won a primetime emmy since wizards of waverly place. 

i’m just frustrated. let me be frustrated lol.

summary: andi mack would be eligible for a primetime emmy, and those nominations are not announced until like july, so there's still time...
question: andi mack would be eligible for a primetime emmy, and those nominations are not announced until like july, so there's still time (esp if they don't c*ncel it by then)
answer: I know, but it’s still just wild to me that it didn’t get nominated last year for either ceremony. And with the increased focus on streaming services, it’s gonna be harder for Disney to pull multiple nominations like they used to. Idk. It’s just annoying that the show hasn’t gotten as much recognition as it deserves, but here’s to hoping we pull through with something.

reblog.comment: I know, but it’s still just wild to me that it didn’t get nominated last year for either ceremony. And with the increased focus on streaming services, it’s gonna be harder for Disney to pull multiple nominations like they used to. Idk. It’s just annoying that the show hasn’t gotten as much recognition as it deserves, but here’s to hoping we pull through with something.

It’s just annoying that the show hasn’t gotten as much recognition as it deserves, but here’s to hoping we pull through with something.

And with the increased focus on streaming services, it’s gonna be harder for Disney to pull multiple nominations like they used to. Idk. It’s just annoying that the show hasn’t gotten as much recognition as it deserves, but here’s to hoping we pull through with something.

summary: Can we not think about how crushed and just... tired Cyrus has to be if he doesnt want to talk with tj about what...
body:
Can we not think about how crushed and just… tired Cyrus has to be if he doesnt want to talk with tj about what happend

Because he felt like tj was the person that from the beginning didn’t saw him as a background character, tj could see him as his rivals small friend, he could see him as a kid who sometimes brings water to the park for some ,frisbee’ practice, he could see him as anyone, but he decided to see Cyrus as Cyrus. And cyrus had let him see him.

And he also saw tj. Not as a bully, jock, the guy that buffy hates, but just as tj

And tj was kind and tj saw him as more then a background character, but now- Cyrus thinks he was let down for Kira- like he once again is shoved into background

The angst has gotten to me
